message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. It's a valuable asset that will be worth a lot to you. I'm confident this price is fair considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good price, but $1100000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need something closer to my initial offer. How about $1150000? This price is still fair for both of us and ensures a smooth transaction.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1120000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
